version_description:
In this update:
- Various optimizations for better game performance
- Visual enhancements
- New sound effects
- Touch zone optimization in HO scenes

Discover new features and enhancements:
* There are new fascinating investigations
* Exchange gifts with all the officers of the city.
* Complete new tasks and make new collections
* Visual and performance improvements
Thank you for your comments! You help us to make the game better!

* Exchange gifts with all the officers of the city.
* Complete new tasks and make new collections
* Visual and performance improvements
Thank you for your comments! You help us to make the game better!

An arsonist appeared in the city - extinguish fire and get a reward!  Rescuing residents on the map became easier and more interesting! And now a new exciting mini-game awaits you in the end of each case!

An arsonist appeared in the city - extinguish fire and get a reward!  Rescuing residents on the map became easier and more interesting! And now a new exciting mini-game awaits you in the end of each case!

In this update:
- Various optimizations for better game performance
- Visual enhancements
- New sound effects
- Touch zone optimization in HO scenes

In this update:
- Various optimizations for better game performance
- Visual enhancements
- New sound effects
- Touch zone optimization in HO scenes

We are happy to introduce a few exciting features. In this update:
- Meet Watson, a smart police dog! Caress the pet and earn bonuses
- Explore locations with your friends for extra award
- Receive daily bonuses and gifts from game characters
- Learn where your help is needed most with a police radar
- Speed up firefighting
- Prolong detention of bandits on the map
- Complete engaging timed tasks
- Use tricks to catch criminals
- Challenge yourself with a new Blitz mode
We would like to improve our game constantly, so we are looking forward to your reviews.
If you like this game, please do not forget to rate us and share amongst your friends.
Enjoy playing!

We are happy to introduce a few exciting features. In this update:
- Meet Watson, a smart police dog! Caress the pet and earn bonuses

We would like to improve our game constantly, so we are looking forward to your reviews.
If you like this game, please do not forget to rate us and share amongst your friends.
Enjoy playing!
Crime City Detective becomes even more engaging! You may now hire another fire brigade! And new tasks on the map bring even more cash!

Join a legendary detective from the Stranger Things Department to solve new crimes starting XP level 10! Watch video to boost fire fighting and prolong detention of thugs on the map!
